comment:
>>44268809
>>44268794
>>44268789

There's a little bit of space in the crowd for you to move through, and you think you see where Eunoia's been fluttering closest to. Staying low to the ground, you maneuver towards it, attempting to minimize contact with the homunculi surrounding you.

In another opening, you can see she's doing a fairly well job of defending herself. Her weapon—a metal rod—has a long reach, and it doesn't necessarily have to be used so lethally as a sword or gun. You breach the crowd, startling her in the process, as she almost whacks you across the face with the pole.

“Watch it!” You shout, almost having to flatten yourself against the ground to avoid the swing.

“You watch it!” She responds. “I think we're all rightfully a little on edge right now! Where's everyone else?”

“I'm about to find that out. Cover me!” You say.

> [[ UI Messenger – Group Chat ]]
> [[ Conversation Topic (Set by Aelriss): Inner Sanctum Expedition ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Yo, is everyone alright?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Status report?
> [[ Nel ]]: under a bookcase
> [[ Nel ]]: just
> [[ Nel ]]: tell me when it's over I guess
> [[ Ayla ]]: Kainzo, Donnel, Dorian, Andor and I are all here.
> [[ Ayla ]]: Close to the center of the crowd, I would reckon. This room seems a lot bigger all of a sudden.
> [[ Ayla ]]: Kainzo's got us covered on protection, but we're sort of boxed in.
> [[ Donnel ]]: At this point, we're banking on this whole thing being temporary.
> [[ Vyx ]]: Tatsumaki and I are already at the next hallway. Get on our level!
> [[ Ayla ]]: Alright. I think we're going to try and make a move there soon, if this doesn't end.
> [[ Ayla ]]: Ascheritte, are you ready?

> [[ 1d100 ]]
name: Sylvetica
